TopicTitle: When launching from the exe, how do I make -popupwindow work?

Articles.Content: Not sure if this would go in technical or gameplay questions, but anyway, as the subject says, how do I set it so that it goes windowed fullscreen with the -popupwindow command?
Haven't tried it but can you just create a link and in the shortcut's target properties add -popupwindow after the .exe?

Create a shortcut and in the properties 'Target' text box put something like 'C:\KSP_win_1.1\KSP.exe -popupwindow'.

Happy landings!
